title: Paoli Dam makes Bollywood comeback in film with bold dialogues
text: Paoli Dam makes Bollywood comeback in film with bold dialogues Sunday, 25 October 2015 (18 minutes ago) Paoli Dam is back in Bollywood after a three-year gap and and this time, she is not in a revenge story but a love story though with some very bold dialogues. Alia Bhatt’s Never Seen Bold Avatar On Magazine Cover! 01:17 Watch the video 22nd October, things have been pretty busy for Alia Bhatt. From promotions to photoshoots, Alia has been doing everything.Alia Bhatt is featured on this month’s cover of ‘Cosmopolitan India’. In the honour of Cosmopolitan’s 19th anniversary, dressed in a... Recent related news Paoli Dam is back in Bollywood after a three-year gap and this time. She is not in a revenge story but a love story though with some very bold dialogues.
